children.caption: A person presses a button on an elevator panel, and the elevator hums to life. A young boy stands in a hallway, looking curious, while a woman's voice can be heard in the background. Later, the same boy stands in an elevator, gazing at the buttons as a woman's voice speaks, seemingly unrelated to the elevator's function.
children.summary: A hand presses a button on a modern elevator panel, accompanied by a faint hum, while a young boy in a blue shirt stands in a hallway and later in a brightly lit elevator, seemingly unaware of the elevator's function.

children.caption: A person presses a button on an elevator panel, initiating the lift's movement with a quiet hum of machinery.
children.summary: A man steps out of an elevator into a modern hallway, presses a button on the panel, and the elevator begins its ascent, accompanied by the sounds of the button click and humming machinery. A young boy in a blue shirt is also present, seemingly unaware of the elevator's function, as the scene is set with bright lighting and modern surroundings.

tree.caption: A series of people interact with elevators, doors, and hallways in various settings, overhearing conversations and saying goodbyes. The scenes shift between different hallways with different designs and lighting, and the voiceovers reveal the thoughts and emotions of the characters.
tree.summary: A man navigates a modern building, entering and exiting elevators, passing various doors with signs, and encountering people saying goodbye and expressing surprise, as the scene repeats with unclear voices in the background. Eventually, he exits the elevator into a modern-designed hallway with an "EXIT" sign, departing with a man's voice saying "Okay" or "Okay, I'll see you in a little bit".
